resource: 1001672.1000851.1000854.description=Do not rely exclusively on the Blind Spot Monitor. Always look over your shoulder and use your turn signal. There are several limitations to the function, detection, range and clarity of the monitor. For a complete list of limitations and directions regarding use of the monitor, please see the Owner's Manual. 1001672.description=Do not rely exclusively on the Blind Spot Monitor.
